ai.summary: An easy 3 km stroll starting at Charlton station, designed for beginners and casual walkers. The route follows flat, well-maintained paths through nearby green spaces and urban scenery, offering a relaxed outing with minimal elevation.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat pavements and grassy paths with occasional gravel sections and simple street crossings. Expect urban park surroundings rather than rugged wilderness.
ai.safety_notes: Check the weather before you go. Wear sturdy, comfortable footwear. Be aware of cyclists and traffic at crossings. Carry water and a small snack, and have a mobile phone with emergency contacts. In low light, bring a flashlight.
recommended_gear: Small map or offline map on phone

seo.title: Charlton Station Walk (Section 4A) – Easy 3 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: A short, easy 3 km hike starting at Charlton station. Flat terrain, suitable for beginners, with practical safety tips and gear suggestions.
